verses.verse: And Joseph <S%H3130><s%> was brought down <S%H3381><s%> to Egypt <S%H4714><s%>; and Potiphar <S%H6318><s%>, an officer <S%H5631><s%> of Pharaoh <S%H6547><s%>'s, the captain <S%H8269><s%> of the guard <S%H2876><s%>, an Egyptian <S%H376><s%>, bought <S%H7069><s%> him of the hand <S%H3027><s%> of the Ishmaelites <S%H3459><s%>, that had brought him down thither <S%H3381><s%>.

And Jehovah <S%H3068><s%> was with Joseph <S%H3130><s%>, and he was a prosperous <S%H6743><s%> man <S%H376><s%>; and he was in the house <S%H1004><s%> of his master <S%H113><s%> the Egyptian <S%H4713><s%>.

And his master <S%H113><s%> saw <S%H7200><s%> that Jehovah <S%H3068><s%> was with him <S%H3068><s%>, and that Jehovah made all that he did <S%H6213><s%> to prosper <S%H6743><s%> in his hand <S%H3027><s%>.

And Joseph <S%H3130><s%> found <S%H4672><s%> favor <S%H2580><s%> in his sight <S%H5869><s%>, and he ministered <S%H8334><s%> unto him <S%H6485><s%>: and he made him overseer over his house <S%H1004><s%>, and all that he had <S%H3426><s%> he put <S%H5414><s%> into his hand <S%H3027><s%>.

And it came to pass from the time <S%H227><s%> that he made him overseer <S%H6485><s%> in his house <S%H1004><s%>, and over all that he had <S%H3426><s%>, that Jehovah <S%H3068><s%> blessed <S%H1288><s%> the Egyptian <S%H4713><s%>'s house <S%H1004><s%> for Joseph <S%H3130><s%>'s sake <S%H1558><s%>; and the blessing <S%H1293><s%> of Jehovah <S%H3068><s%> was upon all that he had <S%H3426><s%>, in the house <S%H1004><s%> and in the field <S%H7704><s%>.

And he left <S%H5800><s%> all that he had in Joseph <S%H3130><s%>'s hand <S%H3027><s%>; and he knew <S%H3045><s%> not aught <S%H3972><s%> that was with him <S%H518><s%>, save the bread <S%H3899><s%> which he did eat <S%H398><s%>. And Joseph <S%H3130><s%> was comely <S%H8389><s%>, and <S%H3303><s%> well-favored <S%H4758><s%>.

And it came to pass after <S%H310><s%> these things <S%H1697><s%>, that his master <S%H113><s%>'s wife <S%H802><s%> cast <S%H5375><s%> her eyes <S%H5869><s%> upon Joseph <S%H3130><s%>; and she said <S%H559><s%>, Lie with me <S%H7901><s%>.

But he refused <S%H3985><s%>, and said <S%H559><s%> unto his master <S%H113><s%>'s wife <S%H802><s%>, Behold <S%H113><s%>, my master knoweth <S%H3045><s%> not what is with me in the house <S%H1004><s%>, and he hath put <S%H5414><s%> all that he hath <S%H3426><s%> into my hand <S%H3027><s%>:

he is not greater <S%H1419><s%> in this house <S%H1004><s%> than I <S%H3808><s%>; neither hath he kept back <S%H2820><s%> anything <S%H3972><s%> from me but thee <S%H834><s%>, because thou <S%H859><s%> art his wife <S%H802><s%>: how then can I do <S%H6213><s%> this great <S%H1419><s%> wickedness <S%H7451><s%>, and sin <S%H2398><s%> against God <S%H430><s%>?

And it came to pass <S%H1696><s%>, as she spake to Joseph <S%H3130><s%> day <S%H3117><s%> by day <S%H3117><s%>, that he hearkened <S%H8085><s%> not unto her <S%H7901><s%>, to lie by her <S%H681><s%>, or to be with her.

And it came to pass about this time <S%H3117><s%>, that he went <S%H935><s%> into the house <S%H1004><s%> to do <S%H6213><s%> his work <S%H4399><s%>; and there was none of the men <S%H376><s%> of the house there within <S%H1004><s%>.

And she caught <S%H8610><s%> him by his garment <S%H899><s%>, saying <S%H559><s%>, Lie <S%H7901><s%> with me <S%H5800><s%>: and he left his garment <S%H899><s%> in her hand <S%H3027><s%>, and fled <S%H5127><s%>, and got <S%H3318><s%> him out <S%H2351><s%>.
And it came to pass <S%H7200><s%>, when she saw that he had left <S%H5800><s%> his garment <S%H899><s%> in her hand <S%H3027><s%>, and was fled <S%H5127><s%> forth <S%H2351><s%>,

that she called <S%H7121><s%> unto the men <S%H582><s%> of her house <S%H1004><s%>, and spake <S%H559><s%> unto them <S%H559><s%>, saying, See <S%H7200><s%>, he hath brought in <S%H935><s%> a Hebrew <S%H376><s%> unto us to mock <S%H6711><s%> us <S%H935><s%>: he came in unto me to lie <S%H7901><s%> with me <S%H7121><s%>, and I cried with a loud <S%H1419><s%> voice <S%H6963><s%>:

and it came to pass <S%H8085><s%>, when he heard that I lifted up <S%H7311><s%> my voice <S%H6963><s%> and cried <S%H7121><s%>, that he left <S%H5800><s%> his garment <S%H899><s%> by me <S%H681><s%>, and fled <S%H5127><s%>, and got him <S%H3318><s%> out <S%H2351><s%>.
And she laid up <S%H3240><s%> his garment <S%H899><s%> by her <S%H681><s%>, until his master <S%H113><s%> came <S%H935><s%> home <S%H1004><s%>.

And she spake <S%H1696><s%> unto him according to these words <S%H1697><s%>, saying <S%H559><s%>, The Hebrew <S%H5680><s%> servant <S%H5650><s%>, whom thou hast brought <S%H935><s%> unto us <S%H935><s%>, came in unto me to mock me <S%H6711><s%>:

and it came to pass <S%H7311><s%>, as I lifted up my voice <S%H6963><s%> and cried <S%H7121><s%>, that he left <S%H5800><s%> his garment <S%H899><s%> by me <S%H681><s%>, and fled <S%H5127><s%> out <S%H2351><s%>.

And it came to pass <S%H113><s%>, when his master heard <S%H8085><s%> the words <S%H1697><s%> of his wife <S%H802><s%>, which she spake <S%H1696><s%> unto him <S%H559><s%>, saying, After this manner <S%H1697><s%> did <S%H6213><s%> thy servant <S%H5650><s%> to me <S%H639><s%>; that his wrath was kindled <S%H2734><s%>.

And Joseph <S%H3130><s%>'s master <S%H113><s%> took <S%H3947><s%> him <S%H5414><s%>, and put him into the prison <S%H1004><s%>, the place <S%H4725><s%> where the king <S%H4428><s%>'s prisoners <S%H615><s%> were bound <S%H631><s%>: and he was there in the prison <S%H1004><s%>.

But Jehovah <S%H3068><s%> was with Joseph <S%H3130><s%>, and showed <S%H5186><s%> kindness <S%H2617><s%> unto him <S%H5414><s%>, and gave him favor <S%H2580><s%> in the sight <S%H5869><s%> of the keeper <S%H8269><s%> of the prison <S%H1004><s%>.

And the keeper <S%H8269><s%> of the prison <S%H1004><s%> committed <S%H5414><s%> to Joseph <S%H3130><s%>'s hand <S%H3027><s%> all the prisoners <S%H615><s%> that were in the prison <S%H1004><s%>; and whatsoever they did <S%H6213><s%> there <S%H6213><s%>, he was the doer of it.

The keeper <S%H8269><s%> of the prison <S%H1004><s%> looked <S%H7200><s%> not to anything <S%H3972><s%> that was under his hand <S%H3027><s%>, because Jehovah <S%H3068><s%> was with him <S%H6213><s%>; and that which he did, Jehovah <S%H3068><s%> made it to prosper <S%H6743><s%>.
